summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Holgate Street, from Ninth Avenue South to a point midway between Oriental and Occidental Avenue, in the City of Seattle, by filling the same to the established grade, in accordance with Resolution No. 1117 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
